description: Array T(n,k) (n>=1, k>=1) read by antidiagonals: T(n,n) = 1 for all n; fill in array above diagonal by symmetry; for row n, starting at diagonal T(n,n)=1, for k > n, T(n,k) = T(n,k-1)-(k-1) if this is positive and has not already appeared in this row, otherwise T(n,k) = T(n,k-1)+(k-1).
